Question: This person defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S.
Hints: In 1961, this person was presented with a grant of arms for all the descendants of Patrick **** from the Chief Herald of Ireland.
A Catholic, this person is the only non-Protestant president, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
